column5: I've tried replying to a thread with a pic last 24 hrs--says server error message on reply board  I checked my status--my file is empty in uploads  Is it me?
Kinda ironic don't ya think??? You have a red X for a pic.

I think photobuckeet is doing some work on their site, many avatars have a message to that effect on several boards the last couple of days.  edit: is this what you are talking bout? I noticed though the problem with overlapping posts in threads with pictures has returned recently.

I have not been able to post any pictures either. It says the server returned an error. Does not matter the source of the photo, web or personal it is denied.  Maybe they just were not interesting enough...
That server msg is what I got--I'll try again----nope server returned an error during upload is what it says  Thanks
A "red X" is what I posted.
Are you guys using flickr or photobucket?  I'm tryin from my pics saved on my computer the way I always have??
Can you do that? I never have, I always thought you had to host them somewhere.
brookE What a great name for a dog  Art
Yes Spiel--for several years now---long as they are under 250kb
Well, I'll have to look into that.
Really?  I've never been able to do it no matter what size.  Guess I'll have to look into it too!
